message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1350000. It's a fair compromise that still reflects the product's value and rarity.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
